awards.title: Jiangsu Adolescents Science & Technology Invention Contest - Second Prize 江苏省青少年科技创新大赛 - 二等奖
awards.awarder: 第三十五届江苏省青少年科技创新大赛组委会
awards.summary: Won second prize in the 35th Jiangsu Adolescents Science & Technology Invention Contest through expo-style final competition. 在第三十五届江苏省青少年科技创新大赛中获得二等奖，通过展览形式进行最终比赛。

awards.title: China High School Biology Olympiad (CHSBO) - Second Prize 全国中学生生物学联赛 - 二等奖
awards.awarder: 全国中学生生物学联赛委员会江苏省分会
awards.summary: Achieved second prize in the China High School Biology Olympiad competition.在中国高中生物奥林匹克竞赛中获得二等奖。

projects.name: Tag Navigator for Obsidian
projects.description: An Obsidian plugin that helps users navigate their notes through tags. 一个帮助用户通过标签导航笔记的 Obsidian 插件。
highlights: Waiting for review on Obsidian community plugins

projects.name: MCP Server for Obsidian 一个为Obsidian·LLM插件开发的MCP服务
projects.description: An MCP server that provides local file access for Obsidian·LLM plugin. 一个为Obsidian·LLM插件提供本地文件访问的MCP服务。
highlights: Used by Obsidian·LLM plugin to access local files

projects.name: obsidian-background-music-plugin
projects.description: Automatically Play background music when opening a note based on frontmatter BGM property. 一个根据frontmatter中的BGM属性自动播放背景音乐的Obsidian插件。
highlights: Used by Obsidian users to enhance note-taking experience
